# Controller Coordinate Systems

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-coordinate`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Work offsets and coordinate rotation

## Capabilities

- Handle coordinate systems for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller coordinate systems.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller coordinate systems capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-gcode-reference`

## Hooks

- `gcode:coordinate:generate`
- `gcode:coordinate:validate`
